data.system_settings: Discord app for Android v3.5.1 using Nexus 5x running Android 7.1.2 beta version
data.actual_result: it wil give a notification without displaying the username of the user sending the invite
data.expected_result: it displays the name of the user sending the request
data.short_description: incoming friend request notification not showing who sent the invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Have discord open on your phone either on the background or foreground - Lock your screen - Receive an invite from another user
